Wellington fire: People asked to avoid Cuba, Ghuznee Sts area; 20m flames spew thick smoke https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-fire-people-asked-to-avoid-cuba-ghuznee-sts-area-20m-flames-spew-thick-smoke/AC7WY6EPZJEPBKXJWXVIHV3GR4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-fire-people-asked-to-avoid-cuba-ghuznee-sts-area-20m-flames-spew-thick-smoke/AC7WY6EPZJEPBKXJWXVIHV3GR4/ Seven fire trucks were responding to the incident, first reported about 2.30pm. Sun, 15 Oct 2023 02:13:15 +0000 Thick smoke is spewing from the blaze in the Cuba and Ghuznee Sts area. Flames as high as 20 metres can be seen lapping from the building.
